ðŸ“– Summary: Groovy is a Python-to-JavaScript transpiler designed for use in the Gradio library. It converts Python functions into their JavaScript equivalents, enabling developers to write Python code that runs efficiently on the client-side. Groovy prioritizes clear error reporting for unsupported Python code, making it easier for developers to adapt their functions accordingly.
